job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongSoftware EngineerstrongppbrppFreeWill is an awardwinning socialgood startup that has raised more than 2 billion for high impact nonprofits since we were founded in 2017 Weve been featured in the New York Times Forbes Oprahs magazine and have even been named to Town amp Countrys Top 50 Philanthropists listppbrppAll of this is because weve figured out how to make some powerful but complicated ways to donate much easier and more accessible Our products make things easier for the donors who want to change the world and for nonprofits doing heroic work around the planetppIn the last 3 years weve grown from 5 people to 95 all smart tenacious and kind and continue to grow quickly Wed love to have you be a part of this adventureppbrppstrongJob descriptionstrongppWe are looking for an ambitious software engineer who wants to make impact at a missiondriven companyppbrppThis role can be remote or based out of New York City Competitive comp amp equity Flexible start date Unfortunately we cant sponsor H1Bs at this timeppbrppRoles amp ResponsibilitiespulliWork on a modern stack including React Nodejs TypeScript PostgreSQL and AWSliliOwn the design and development of new features for FreeWill web applicationsliliLearn and grow in a collaborative environment sharing knowledge through code reviews pair programming 11 conversations and broader team trainingsliliInteract closely with a diverse team across legal growth design and productliliContribute ideas to improve our product technology and team practicesliliGain knowledge of endoflife planning and nonprofit fundraising  what currently is working what is not and what tech can do to help fix itliulpbrppTechnical Skillspulli2 years professional experienceliliBachelors degree in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent training fellowship or work experienceliliFamiliarity with databases API design automated testing debugging and web front endsliulpbrppOther Important TraitspulliIntense curiosityliliScrappiness and gritliliFocus on continuous learningliliComfort with ambiguityliulpbrppBenefitsppIn addition to helping raise 1T for high impact nonprofits and a kind and joyful work environment full time employees at FreeWill are eligible for the following benefitspulliWork from homelili120 monthly stipend to outfit your home office or cover utility billsliliUnlimited PTOliliStaff holidays and FreeDays periodic one day office closures to rest and refreshliliCompany stock optionslili401kliliMedicalDentalVision some single coverage medical plans are 100 employer paid subsidized rates for spousal parentchild and family coverageliliFree One Medical membershipliliPaid parental leaveliliBook policy Well cover any reasonably priced books that will make you better at your job ie how to excel in sales or improve the FreeWill community ie books on antiracismliulpbrppFreeWill is an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity We are committed to finding talent that is not determined on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusppWe are a remotefirst company thats able to hire in 47 states and DC Unfortunately we are unable to hire in Colorado Alabama or Louisiana at this time We also cant sponsor working visas so all applicants will need to have work authorization in the USppExcited about our mission Success in serving nonprofit partners requires our dedication to building a diverse equitable and inclusive team We encourage people from underrepresented backgrounds and all walks of life to apply We cant wait to learn with and from youp
